remarks: Map from nonzero vectors to nonzero functionals in the closed kernel dual space.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-2015.)
statement:
hvmapval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hvmapval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmapval.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmapval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hvmapval.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
hvmapval.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hvmapval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hvmapval.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hvmapval.r $e |- R = ( Base ` S ) $.
hvmapval.m $e |- M = ( ( HVMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmapval.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. A /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hvmapfval $p |- ( ph -> M = ( x e. ( V \ { .0. } ) |-> ( v e. V |-> ( iota_ j e. R E. t e. ( O ` { x } ) v = ( t .+ ( j .x. x ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .0. x $.
$d K j t v x $.
$d O t $.
$d R j $.
$d V x $.
$d W j t v x $.
